string-array.name: general_knowledge_sub_categories_description
string-array.item: Explore the world\'s continents, countries, and landmarks.
Learn about historical events, cultures, and civilizations.
Discover advancements in science and the latest technologies.
Stay informed about current events and news from around the globe.
Understand fundamental principles of physics, chemistry, and biology.
Get to know influential figures who have made a significant impact.

string-array.name: science_questions
string-array.item: What is the chemical symbol for water?
Who is considered the father of modern physics?
How does photosynthesis occur in plants?
What is the largest planet in our solar system?
What is the speed of light in a vacuum?

string-array.name: science_descriptions
string-array.item: Explore the world of chemistry and biology with questions about elements and compounds.
Learn about groundbreaking scientists and their contributions to the field of physics.
Understand the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy.
Discover facts about the planets in our solar system, including their sizes and characteristics.
Delve into the fundamentals of physics with questions about the speed of light and related concepts.

string-array.name: technology_questions
string-array.item: Who co-founded Microsoft along with Bill Gates?
What is the significance of Moore\'s Law in computing?
Which programming language is often used for mobile app development?
What does the acronym "URL" stand for?
Which company is known for producing the iPhone and iPad?

string-array.name: technology_descriptions
string-array.item: Explore the history of technology and its pioneers with questions about notable figures.
Understand the impact of Moore\'s Law on the development of computer technology.
Learn about programming languages commonly used in creating applications for mobile devices.
Discover the meaning behind common technology-related acronyms, such as "URL."
Get insights into companies that have played a significant role in the tech industry.

string-array.name: entertainment_questions
string-array.item: Who won the Academy Award for Best Actor in 2021?
Which film is often considered the highest-grossing of all time?
Who is known as the "Queen of Pop" in the music industry?
What is the name of the fictional wizarding school in the Harry Potter series?
Which TV series features the phrase "Winter is coming"?

string-array.name: entertainment_descriptions
string-array.item: Stay updated on the world of entertainment with questions about recent award winners.
Explore the realm of cinema with questions about box office records and popular films.
Learn about iconic figures in the music industry and their nicknames.
Immerse yourself in the magical world of literature with questions about famous wizarding schools.
Test your knowledge of popular TV series with questions about famous catchphrases.

string-array.name: sports_questions
string-array.item: Who holds the record for the most Olympic gold medals in swimming?
Which country hosted the FIFA World Cup in 2018?
Who is often referred to as "The Greatest" in the history of boxing?
What is the highest score ever achieved in a single NBA game?
Which tennis player has won the most Grand Slam singles titles?

string-array.name: sports_descriptions
string-array.item: Explore the world of swimming and the achievements of record-breaking Olympic athletes.
Test your knowledge of FIFA World Cup history with questions about host countries.
Learn about legendary boxers and their impact on the sport of boxing.
Discover remarkable performances in NBA history with questions about high scores.
Get insights into the achievements of tennis players who have excelled in Grand Slam events.

string-array.item: Who wrote the play "Romeo and Juliet"?
What is the main theme of the novel "1984" by George Orwell?
Which author is known for the "Harry Potter" book series?
What is the title of Jane Austen\'s most famous novel?
Who wrote the poem "The Raven"?

string-array.name: literature_descriptions
string-array.item: Explore the world of classic literature with questions about famous playwrights.
Discuss the themes and dystopian elements of George Orwell\'s novel "1984."
Test your knowledge of modern literature with questions about popular book series.
Learn about the works of Jane Austen, a prominent figure in English literature.
Discover the poet behind the hauntingly beautiful poem "The Raven."

string-array.item: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
What art movement is characterized by bright colors and bold shapes?
Which famous architect designed the Sydney Opera House?
What is the name of the traditional Japanese tea ceremony?
Who is known as the "father of modern dance"?

string-array.name: arts_and_culture_descriptions
string-array.item: Explore the world of visual arts with questions about iconic paintings and painters.
Learn about art movements that have left a lasting impact on the art world.
Discover the architects behind some of the world\'s most famous landmarks.
Immerse yourself in the traditions of Japanese culture with questions about tea ceremonies.
Understand the contributions of influential figures in the field of modern dance.

string-array.item: What is the main ingredient in guacamole?
Which country is known for inventing sushi?
What is the primary ingredient in the Italian dish risotto?
Which type of wine is often paired with seafood?
What is the national dish of India?

string-array.name: food_and_drink_descriptions
string-array.item: Test your knowledge of popular dishes with questions about their main ingredients.
Explore the origins of international cuisine with questions about cultural food inventions.
Learn about the ingredients that make Italian risotto a delicious and comforting dish.
Discover the art of wine pairing with questions about matching wines with specific foods.
Explore the rich and diverse flavors of Indian cuisine with questions about its national dish.

string-array.item: What is the value of pi (Ï€) to two decimal places?
Which branch of mathematics deals with the properties of shapes and figures?
What is the sum of the angles in a triangle?
Who is known for the development of calculus?
What is the Pythagorean theorem?

string-array.item: Test your knowledge of mathematical constants with questions about the value of pi.
Explore different branches of mathematics with questions about geometry and shapes.
Understand the fundamental principles of geometry with questions about triangle angles.
Learn about influential mathematicians who made significant contributions to calculus.
Discover the famous theorem that relates the sides of a right triangle.

string-array.name: language_and_words_questions
string-array.item: What is the longest word in the English language?
Which language has the most native speakers in the world?

Who is the author of the play "Romeo and Juliet"?
What is the term for a word that is spelled the same backward as forward?

string-array.item: Test your knowledge of the English language with questions about long words.
Explore linguistic diversity with questions about languages with the most native speakers.
Challenge your word skills with questions about anagrams and wordplay.
Test your knowledge of classic literature with questions about famous playwrights.
Learn about words that form the same word when spelled backward.

string-array.item: What is the largest mammal on Earth?

What is the term for the loss of a species from a particular habitat?
Which planet is known as the "Red Planet"?

string-array.item: Explore the wonders of the natural world with questions about Earth\'s largest mammals.
Learn about the composition of Earth\'s atmosphere with questions about major gases.
Understand the process of photosynthesis with questions about how plants produce their own food.
Explore ecological concepts with questions about the loss of species from specific habitats.
Discover interesting facts about the fourth planet from the Sun, known as the "Red Planet."

string-array.item: Who is the king of the gods in Greek mythology?

What is the Hindu god of creation and destruction?

string-array.item: Explore ancient Greek mythology with questions about the king of the gods.
Learn about Norse mythology with questions about the god associated with thunder.
Discover mythical creatures with questions about creatures that combine different animals.
Explore the pantheon of ancient Greek gods with questions about the goddess of wisdom.
Learn about Hindu mythology with questions about the god responsible for creation and destruction.
